column4: I fucked my mysql installation by not setting any password. Then I deleted all conf files and removed mysql-server and mysql-server-5.0 packages. Now I cant install. What to do?
I screwed my mysql installation by not setting any password. Then I deleted all conf files and removed mysql-server and mysql-server-5.0 packages. Now I cant install. What to do?
what do you mean with "Now I cant install"?
run "LANG= sudo synaptic" to get synaptic in english
